channel.title: I need some help just about done here
channel.description:
Where do I get a server.class, it says I need that before I run server.
Compile code: @echo off cls :menu title Compiler echo Please choose an option below to do that function. echo Keep posted on the Moparscape Tutorials section for echo any updates that I post. echo. echo c - Compile your server. echo r - To run your server. echo e - To exit out of the program. echo. echo. set /p compile=Option: if %compile%==c goto compile if %compile%==C goto compile if %compile%==r goto run if %compile%==R goto run if %compile%==e goto end if %compile%==E goto end if %compile#==* goto error goto error :compile cls title Compiler if defined javac (goto compile2) else (goto checkjavac) :compile2 if exist *.java (goto compile3) else (goto compileerror) :compile3 %javac% -cp . *.java pause cls goto menu :compileerror cls echo You need to have Java files for this compiler to compile. pause cls goto menu :run cls title Runserver if exist .\server.class (goto run2) else (goto servererror) :run2 set java=java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar cls goto run3 :run3 %java% server pause cls goto menu :servererror cls title Error echo You do not have a Server.class. Make sure that you have used the echo compiler with your server BEFORE you try running it. pause cls goto menu :error cls title Error echo Invalid command. Please make sure the commands you type echo in are correct. pause cls goto menu :end cls exit :checkjavac if exist "%program
Saved as file compile.bat
Run code @echo off title MetraScape java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server pause
But how do I make it my server(Might be already because at client.java I changed the name) and able to run it says I need server.class, how I get that? Also when I press the option for compile ur server because when I click run server it tells me to, I click the option and the screen freezes so Im guessing I need a server.class

item.title: I need some help just about done here
item.dc:creator: @Heveanlyrune Heveanlyrune
item.description:
@Heveanlyrune wrote:

Where do I get a server.class, it says I need that before I run server.

Compile code: @echo off
cls
:menu
title Compiler
echo Please choose an option below to do that function.
echo Keep posted on the Moparscape Tutorials section for
echo any updates that I post.
echo.
echo c - Compile your server.
echo r - To run your server.
echo e - To exit out of the program.
echo.
echo.
set /p compile=Option:
if %compile%==c goto compile
if %compile%==C goto compile
if %compile%==r goto run
if %compile%==R goto run
if %compile%==e goto end
if %compile%==E goto end
if %compile#==* goto error
goto error
:compile
cls
title Compiler
if defined javac (goto compile2) else (goto checkjavac)
:compile2
if exist *.java (goto compile3) else (goto compileerror)
:compile3
%javac% -cp . *.java
pause
cls
goto menu
:compileerror
cls
echo You need to have Java files for this compiler to compile.
pause
cls
goto menu
:run
cls
title Runserver
if exist .\server.class (goto run2) else (goto servererror)
:run2
set java=java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar
cls
goto run3
:run3
%java% server
pause
cls
goto menu
:servererror
cls
title Error
echo You do not have a Server.class. Make sure that you have used the
echo compiler with your server BEFORE you try running it.
pause
cls
goto menu
:error
cls
title Error
echo Invalid command. Please make sure the commands you type
echo in are correct.
pause
cls
goto menu
:end
cls
exit
:checkjavac
if exist "%program

Saved as file compile.bat

Run code @echo off
title MetraScape
java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server
pause

But how do I make it my server(Might be already because at client.java I changed the name) and able to run it says I need server.class, how I get that? Also when I press the option for compile ur server because when I click run server it tells me to, I click the option and the screen freezes so Im guessing I need a server.class

Read full topic
item.source: I need some help just about done here
